title: What are the greatest engineering accomplishments of the 20th century? - Quora

response.answer_text: At the mechanical engineering level I suggest the 747 In Civil Engineering… perhaps the Channel Tunnel Computer engineering.. the Pentium Chip 32 Bit In genetic engineering… there are many … Fabrazyme… or Trastuzumab ( anti Her2 for breast cancer) as examples In social Engineering… the google search Algorithm (the Original was not all powerful I know.. but it was a start)

There are actually quite a few, such as sending the Viking probes to the surface of Mars. The Panama Canal. The Hoover Dam. But by far the #1 engineering achievement of mankind in the 20th Century is sending a man to the moon and bringing him back safely. That’s going to be Mankind’s high water mark for quite some time.
